template.parameter: LocalSchedulerData &data, int &abs_deadline[MAX_TASKS_NUM], int &is_ready[MAX_TASKS_NUM], int &prio[MAX_TASKS_NUM], int &id[MAX_TASKS_NUM], chan &wakeup, chan&sleep, chan&ready, chan&finished, chan&exec[MAX_TASKS_NUM], chan&preempt[MAX_TASKS_NUM]

template.name: EDF1
template.parameter: LocalSchedulerData &data, int &abs_deadline[MAX_TASKS_NUM], int &is_ready[MAX_TASKS_NUM], int &prio[MAX_TASKS_NUM], int &id[MAX_TASKS_NUM], chan &wakeup, chan&sleep, chan&ready, chan&finished, chan&exec[MAX_TASKS_NUM], chan&preempt[MAX_TASKS_NUM]

transition.label: i: int[0, MAX_TASKS_NUM-1], h: int[0, MAX_TASKS_NUM-1]
i<data.numOfTasks && j<data.numOfTasks && i != h && is_ready[h] == 1&& abs_deadline[i] > abs_deadline[h]
exec[i]?

template.name: EDF1_1
template.parameter: LocalSchedulerData &data, int &abs_deadline[MAX_TASKS_NUM], int &is_ready[MAX_TASKS_NUM], int &prio[MAX_TASKS_NUM], int &id[MAX_TASKS_NUM], chan &wakeup, chan&sleep, chan&ready, chan&finished, chan&exec[MAX_TASKS_NUM], chan&preempt[MAX_TASKS_NUM]

transition.label: i: int[0, MAX_TASKS_NUM-1], h: int[0, MAX_TASKS_NUM-1]
i<data.numOfTasks && j<data.numOfTasks && i != h && is_ready[h] == 1&& abs_deadline[i] == abs_deadline[h] &&id[i] > id[h]
exec[i]?
